title: The Frank Show
description: A long-form exploration of the art of walking and its relationship to thinking and creativity. This piece examines how the simple act of putting one foot in front of the other can unlock new perspectives and ideas.

title: Photography Series: Urban Silence
description: A collection of photographs capturing quiet moments in bustling cities. Each image explores the contrast between urban density and unexpected pockets of solitude.

title: Performance: Echoes in the Archive
description: A multimedia performance piece that recontextualizes archival audio recordings through live improvisation and spatial sound design. Premiered at the Contemporary Arts Center.

title: Research: The Poetics of Computing
description: An investigation into how computational thinking intersects with creative practice. This ongoing research explores historical connections between early computing and literary experimentation.

title: Micro-essay: On Revision
description: A brief meditation on the recursive nature of editing and the relationship between iteration and insight.

title: Portrait Series: Makers
description: Environmental portraits of craftspeople and artists in their studios. Each photograph is accompanied by a short interview about process and practice.
